gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui
Class FileChooser

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui.FileChooser

public class FileChooser
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a file chooser for which the user can control the modality, application-modal or document-modal. The default modality is document-modal, rather than application-modal, as for JFileChooser.

Method Detail

showOpenDialog

public int showOpenDialog(java.awt.Component parent)
Pops up an "Open File" file chooser dialog. Note that the text that appears in the approve button is determined by the L&F.

Parameters:
parent - the parent component of the dialog, can be null; see showDialog for details
Returns:
the return state of the file chooser

showDialog

public int showDialog(java.awt.Component parent,
                      java.lang.String approveButtonText)
               throws java.awt.HeadlessException
Pops a custom file chooser dialog with a custom approve button.

Parameters:
parent - the parent component of the dialog; can be null
approveButtonText - the text of the ApproveButton
Returns:
the return state of the file chooser
Throws:
java.awt.HeadlessException - if GraphicsEnvironment.isHeadless() returns true.
See Also:
GraphicsEnvironment.isHeadless()

setModalityType

public void setModalityType(java.awt.Dialog.ModalityType modalityType)
Sets the modality type for the file chooser dialog that will be shown.

Parameters:
modalityType - the new modality type

Sets the initial directory for the file chooser that will be shown.

Parameters:

setApproveButtonText

public void setApproveButtonText(java.lang.String newText)
Sets the text of the approval button. Default is "open" for an open dialog box.

Parameters:
newText - the new approve button text

getSelectedFile

public java.io.File getSelectedFile()
Gets the file that was selected by the user, or null, if no file was selected.

Sets the file selection mode. See JFileChooser.setFileSelectionMode(int).

Parameters:

setMultiSelectionEnabled

public void setMultiSelectionEnabled(boolean b)
Sets whether multiselection is allowed.

Parameters:
b - true, if multiple files may be selected
